  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move()
      Moves unit on the map, if the unit hasn't moved yet. Otherwise does nothing.
      Specified by:

    • handlePositionBeyondMap

      protected abstract int[] handlePositionBeyondMap​(int[] newPosition)
      Invoked when new position is beyond the map. Specifies unit's behavior in situations of moving out of the map/
      Parameters:
      newPosition - Position that is beyond the map.
